game.name: Military Incremental Complex
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 무기를 제작하고, 돈을 버세요. 이 능동적인 증가 게임에서는 군사 산업 복합 회사를 운영해 최대한 많은 돈을 모으게 됩니다. 다양한 여러 무기를 생산하고, 업그레이드를 연구하며, 주식 시장을 조종하고, 로비를 통해 정부로부터 혜택을 얻으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Make weapons, make money. An active incremental game where you amass as much money as you can by starting a Military Industrial Complex company. Produce multiple different weapons, research upgrades, manipulate the stock market, and lobby the government for favors.

reviewHighlights.text: Game is too short for IRL money. Many other idle games that are free, while more of a grind, but free, are longer and have more content. IDK, I was re...
Not remotely worth the pricetag + it has a furry upgrade that credits some degenerate on discord for the idea
